ANDS-Grants.description: This project will develop a model of professional development and effective classroom strategies to improve 12-16 year old school students' decision-making about socioscientific issues. Key outcomes will be improved scientific literacy and willingness by young people to use scientific evidence when making personal and community decisions.
ANDS-Grants.title: Discovery Projects - Grant ID: DP130103035
